title: 01 -- MFg-Website -- Josuel Garcia

milestone.title: 01 -- MF'g Website
milestone.description:
* Open WIP Issue
* Link to open PR in `TIY-Assignments`
  * Branch in `TIY-Assignments` named `feature/01--mfg-website`
  * 10x in `docs/HTML.md`
  * _some_ HTML in `pub/about.html` and `pub/culture.html` (lenient)
  * 2x :thumbsup: (lenient)
* Link to wiki page: "Growth and Fixed Mindsets"
  * 3+ bullets for each mindset
  * personal notes

body:
### Tasks

* [X] Create a new Issue with these tasks!
* [x] Estimate all the tasks with _T-shirt sizes_: _S_, _M_, _L_, _XL_
* [x] **[ (L) Try Git](http://try.github.com)** -- Rinse, Lather, Repeat...
* [x] ** (M) The Growth and Fixed Mindsets** -- Research and Essay _notes_...
    * [x] Watch the _Growth and Fixed Mindset_ videos:
        * [_You Can Learn Anything_ by Khan Academy](https://www.khanacademy.org/youcanlearnanything) (4 videos total)
        * [_The Power of Yet_ by Carol Dweck at TED](https://www.ted.com/talks/carol_dweck_the_power_of_believing_that_you_can_improve),
        * [_Growth Mindsets and Motivation_ by ed-TED](http://ed.ted.com/on/UA77FlTc)
    * [x] Create a new page in your `TIY-Assignments` wiki called _Growth and Fixed Mindset_
    * [x] Write down _at least 3_ key attributes of each mindset using Markdown bullets
* [x] ** (M) Yak Shaving** -- The invisible tasks...
    * [x] Use the Github web interface to create a branch called `feature/01--mfg-website`
    * [x] In Github, open a PR _from_ `feature/01--mfg-website` _into_ `master`
* [x] ** (L) Reading HTML** -- Document 10 _block-level_ HTML elements and **commit after each!**
    * [x] Checkpoint: Created and committed `docs/HTML.md`!
    * [x] Checkpoint: First tag documented!
    * [x] Checkpoint: 5 tags documented!
    * [x] Misson Complete: All 10 tags!
* [x] ** (M) Your MF'g Website** -- [About](http://theironyard.com/about) and [Culture](http://theironyard.com/about/culture) with **no copy-pasta!**
    * [x] Checkpoint: Created and committed `pub/about.html`!
    * [x] Checkpoint: Created and committed `pub/culture.html`!
    * [x] Checkpoint: Pushed `pub/about.html` and `pub/culture.html`!
    * [x] Checkpoint: Finished and committed `pub/about.html`!
    * [x] Checkpoint: Finished and committed `pub/culture.html`!
    * [x] Mission Complete: Finished, committed and pushed!
